content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: USUBJID
      operator: is_contained_by
      value: $ex_usubjid
    - name: RFXSTDTC
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: $min_ex_exstdtc
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.305
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when EX records are present for subject but RFXSTDTC does
  not equal the earliest value of EX.EXSTDTC
Operations:
  - operator: distinct
    domain: EX
    name: USUBJID
    id: $ex_usubjid
  - operator: min_date
    domain: EX
    name: EXSTDTC
    id: $min_ex_exstdtc
    group:
      - USUBJID
Outcome:
  Message: RFXSTDTC does not equal the earliest value of EX.EXSTDTC
  Output Variables:
    - RFXSTDTC
    - $min_ex_exstdtc
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '305'
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: First date/time of exposure to any protocol-specified
                  treatment or therapy, equal to the earliest value of EXSTDTC.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 5.1.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Raise an error when EX records are present for subject but RFXSTDTC does not equal the earliest value of EX.EXSTDTC

Outcome.Message: RFXSTDTC does not equal the earliest value of EX.EXSTDTC

Citations.Cited_Guidance: First date/time of exposure to any protocol-specified treatment or therapy, equal to the earliest value of EXSTDTC.
